abstract: Leonardo Bonucci (Italian pronunciation: [leoˈnardo boˈnuttʃi]; born 1 May 1987) is an Italian footballer who plays as a defender for Serie A club Juventus and the Italian national team. A ball-playing centre back, he is known for his passing range and ability to launch an attack with long passes.
